message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $12,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
